name: The Savory Spoon
description: A cozy spot for comfort food lovers. Indulge in our delicious home-style dishes.

menu.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
menu.description: Classic Italian pasta dish with savory Bolognese sauce.

menu.name: Grilled Chicken Caesar Salad
menu.description: Fresh romaine lettuce, grilled chicken, croutons, and Caesar dressing.

menu.name: Classic Apple Pie
menu.description: Homemade apple pie with a flaky crust and cinnamon-infused apples.

name: Fusion Flavors
description: Experience a fusion of global flavors in every bite. Culinary delights from around the world.

menu.name: Sushi Platter

menu.description: Tender chicken pieces in a creamy and flavorful tomato-based curry.

menu.name: Tiramisu

name: Cheesy Delights
description: A haven for cheese enthusiasts. Explore a variety of cheesy dishes crafted with love.

menu.name: Blueberry Cheesecake

menu.name: Avocado Toast

menu.name: Grilled Vegetables
menu.description: Assortment of fresh vegetables grilled to enhance their natural flavors.

menu.name: Chocolate Fondue
